title: Onigiri ni Naritai Cogimyun
original_name: おにぎりになりたい こぎみゅん
sinopse: A prequel to Cogimyun covering her life at flour school before she runs her grandfather's apartment complex. Episodes air within the "Millenia Girl" live action program and then get released for a limited time later in the day on Sanrio's official YouTube channel.
